segments.text: Hi , Gary , what happened ? I was waiting for you at the theater . Why didn ’ t you meet me there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought we were supposed to meet HERE .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t you know our movie starts at seven ? And we were going to meet at the theater at five to seven . Then it doesn ’ t make sense to meet at the apartment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry . We must have misunderstood each other .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don ’ t you try to be clearer about your intentions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ re right . I am sorry . Let ’ s go and watch the movie .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s okay . I don ’ t want to go now . We ’ Ve already missed ten minutes of the movie . I don ’ t want to see a movie without watching the beginning .
segments.speaker: S2
